alert.note: Alert for Greene; Montgomery; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:48PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL WARREN, NORTHWESTERN GREENE AND CENTRAL MONTGOMERY COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 648 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Miamisburg, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Kettering, Beavercreek, Huber Heights, Fairborn, Trotwood, Miamisburg, Springboro, Vandalia, Franklin, Bellbrook, Moraine, Carlisle, Oakwood, Yellow Springs, Wright-Patterson Afb, West Carrollton, Riverside, Clayton and Germantown. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 30 and 37. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 39 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
